instance.context:
the large display_board at the
New_York_Stock_Exchange that reports on stocks traded on the exchange ;

a stock_market for trading in securities not listed on the
New_York_Stock_Exchange ;

an indicator of stock market_prices ; based on the share values of 30 blue-chip_stocks listed on the
New_York_Stock_Exchange ;

a street in lower Manhattan where the
New_York_Stock_Exchange is located ; symbol of American finance ;
